Articles.Content:
> 
> How much are you willing to bet that we can get to 300 pages before release?

All of my career save funds!
Two per minute, we can do it yet!
Were DDOSing Squad's servers

> 
> Ha ha ha

Even funnier 'cause it's true! How else could they support this?
How do you know the post rate for a thread?

Whenever I refresh there is a whole new page.

Anyway, I alas shall have to be leaving before I can see it. But have fun to all who can stay.

 Be careful not to start a planet wide winter with all the dust from rocket launches.
Harv is online GO FOR 300 MUCH FASTER
sshhhh.... HarvesteR is on the forum guys!
Just pitching in
Just watch and count
how many round trips to minmus can the hype fuel
WHERE IS GREGROX?!?! I think i see the station... That's a really solid looking brick wall the end of the tracks.

> 
> How do you know the post rate for a thread?

There are no sensors which can measure these speeds
We need to break the record!!! Go go go!
how do you know the devs have signed on
The hype train is now at 100 posts/minute

> 
> Harv is online GO FOR 300 MUCH FASTER

Metaphysical hype field, slow down time for us! We have a mission!
I can only imagine The Vengabus "We Like To Party" going on in the background
\*Waves to harvestR\*

![users.png](http://www.kbenedetti.com/ksp/users.png)

YOOWWWWZA!
Who's gonna bet Harv's checking the post count on the Hype thread, with his hand on the launch button!

My comment for every HypeTrain thread as it nears release:

It's like a New Year's Eve party with no clocks, everyone is excited and full of anticipation but no one is exactly sure when the big moment will come.
i wanna be part of this endeavour

> 
> where is gregrox?!?! I think i see the station... That's a really solid looking brick wall the end of the tracks.

i see it too
